tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE gene_ontology (
  gene_id INT,
  gene_name VARCHAR(255),
  go_term VARCHAR(255),
  go_definition TEXT,
  go_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE gene_annotations (
  gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_symbol VARCHAR(255),
  go_term VARCHAR(255),
  annotation_desc TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE go_terms (
  go_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  go_name VARCHAR(255),
  go_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE gene_go_mapping (
  gene_id INT,
  go_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES gene_annotations(gene_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (go_id) REFERENCES go_terms(go_id)
)

CREATE TABLE GeneInfo (
    gene_id UUID NOT NULL,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    gene_description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (gene_id)
)

CREATE TABLE GoTerm (
    go_id UUID NOT NULL,
    go_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    go_description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (go_id)
)

CREATE TABLE GeneGoMapping (
    mapping_id UUID NOT NULL,
    gene_id UUID NOT NULL,
    go_id UUID NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES GeneInfo(gene_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (go_id) REFERENCES GoTerm(go_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (mapping_id)
)

CREATE TABLE GeneGoAnnotation (
    annotation_id UUID NOT NULL,
    mapping_id UUID NOT NULL,
    annotation_date DATE,
    annotation_source VARCHAR(255),
    annotation_confidence FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (annotation_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (mapping_id) REFERENCES GeneGoMapping(mapping_id)
)
CREATE TABLE genes (gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_name TEXT, gene_description TEXT, go_term TEXT)
CREATE TABLE go_terms (go_id INT PRIMARY KEY, term TEXT, definition TEXT, category TEXT)
CREATE TABLE gene_go_mapping (mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_id INT, go_id INT, evidence TEXT)
CREATE TABLE gene_annotations (annotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_id INT, annotation_text TEXT)
CREATE TABLE visualize_data (visualization_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_id INT, go_id INT, visualization_url TEXT)
